title: Nami's TRAGIC Backstory.. || Bellemere's Death || One Piece Episode 33-36
author: Unknown Reactor
description: Reaction video covering episodes 33-36 showing Nami's tragic backstory and Bellemere's death. Viewer reacts to how Nami was adopted by Bellemere and they became a family.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through episode 36 - Bellemere's death and Nami's backstory

title: Episode 36 Review: OnePiece Anime
author: Tayyab Ali
description: Fan review describing episode 36 as 'a tearfull emotional rollercoaster that concludes Nami's backstory in a powerfull and memorable way' with Bellemere 'capturimg the power of familly and love.'

title: Episode 36: Analyzing Bellemere's Sacrifice
author: C. Ano
description: Detailed analysis of Bellemere's sacrifice in episode 36, discussing the emotional impact and thematic significance of her decision to acknowledge her daughters even at the cost of her life.

title: One Piece: The Hate Against Nami's Mother Bellemere is Unjustified
author: FandomWire Staff
description: Defense article arguing that criticism of Bellemere's decision is unjustified. Analyzes how by sacrificing herself and accepting Nami and Nojiko as her daughters, Bellemere ensured her daughters knew their significance in her life.

title: Bellemere's Sacrifice in One Piece Still Brings Confusions Among Fans
author: India Today Gaming Staff
description: Article discussing the ongoing debate and confusion among fans about whether Bellemere's decision was the right choice, given that it led to Nami and Nojiko being traumatized and marked the beginning of the worst phase in Nami's life.

description: Official One Piece Facebook page sharing the emotional scene of Bellemere's death from episode 36.

title: Survive! Mother Bellemere and Nami's Bond!

description: Official streaming of episode 36 on Apple TV platform.
